00024 #ifndef __MT_GENERATION_THREAD_POOL_H__
00025 #define __MT_GENERATION_THREAD_POOL_H__
00026 
00027 #if !defined(__APPLE_CC__)
00028 
00029 #include <import/sys.h>
00030 #include "mt/BasicThreadPool.h"
00031 #include "mt/CPUAffinityInitializer.h"
00032 #include "mt/CPUAffinityThreadInitializer.h"
00033 
00034 namespace mt
00035 {
00036     class TiedRequestHandler : public sys::Runnable
00037     {
00038         RunnableRequestQueue* mRequestQueue;
00039         sys::Semaphore* mSem;
00040         CPUAffinityThreadInitializer* mAffinityInit;
00041 
00042     public:
00043         TiedRequestHandler(RunnableRequestQueue* requestQueue) :
00044             mRequestQueue(requestQueue), mAffinityInit(NULL) {}
00045                 
00046         virtual ~TiedRequestHandler();
00047 
00048         virtual void setSemaphore(sys::Semaphore* sem)
00049         {
00050             mSem = sem;
00051         }
00052         virtual void setAffinityInit(CPUAffinityThreadInitializer* affinityInit)
00053         {
00054             mAffinityInit = affinityInit;
00055         }
00056 
00057         // If we have a thread initializer, tie down our handler to a CPU
00058         virtual void initialize();
00059 
00060         virtual void run();
00061     };
00062 
00063     class GenerationThreadPool : public BasicThreadPool<TiedRequestHandler>
00064     {
00065         sys::Semaphore mGenerationSync;
00066         CPUAffinityInitializer* mAffinityInit;
00067         int mGenSize;
00068     public:
00069         GenerationThreadPool(unsigned short numThreads = 0,
00070                              CPUAffinityInitializer* affinityInit = NULL) 
00071             : BasicThreadPool<TiedRequestHandler>(numThreads), 
00072             mAffinityInit(affinityInit), mGenSize(0)
00073             {
00074             }
00075         virtual ~GenerationThreadPool() {}
00076         
00077         virtual TiedRequestHandler *newRequestHandler()
00078         {
00079             TiedRequestHandler* handler = BasicThreadPool<TiedRequestHandler>::newRequestHandler();
00080             handler->setSemaphore(&mGenerationSync);
00081                 
00082             if (mAffinityInit)
00083                 handler->setAffinityInit(mAffinityInit->newThreadInitializer());
00084             
00085             
00086             return handler;
00087         }
00088     
00089         // Not set up for multiple producers 
00090         virtual void addGroup(std::vector<sys::Runnable*>& toRun);
00091         
00092         // Not set up for multiple producers 
00093         virtual void waitGroup();
00094         
00095         virtual void addAndWaitGroup(std::vector<sys::Runnable*>& toRun)
00096         {
00097             addGroup(toRun);
00098             waitGroup();
00099         }
00100         virtual void shutdown();
00101 
00102     };
00103 }
00104 #endif
